workflow.name: Smart travel package finder: Search flights & hotels with Skyscanner-Booking.com
workflow.description:
## Introduction
Automates travel itinerary creation by searching flights and hotels via APIs, then uses AI to generate personalized recommendations delivered as HTML emails through Gmail.
## How It Works
Webhook receives travel requests, searches Skyscanner and Booking.com APIs in parallel, merges results, uses AI to create optimized itineraries, formats as HTML email, sends via Gmail.
## Workflow Template
Webhook ‚Üí Parse & Validate ‚Üí Parallel Searches (Flights: Skyscanner | Hotels: Booking.com) ‚Üí Merge Data ‚Üí AI Generate Itinerary ‚Üí Format HTML Email ‚Üí Send Gmail ‚Üí Webhook Response
## Workflow Steps
1. Trigger & Validate: Webhook receives request, extracts destination/dates/budget/preferences, validates data, converts to API parameters.
2. Parallel Search: Skyscanner fetches flights with price/duration/airline. Booking.com retrieves hotels with ratings/pricing. Merge combines both into single JSON object.
3. AI Generation: AI analyzes merged data, evaluates by price/duration/rating, creates itinerary with daily schedule, pairings, costs, and rankings.
4. Delivery: Converts JSON to HTML email with tables and booking links. Gmail sends email. Webhook confirms success.
## Setup Instructions
1. API Configuration: Add Skyscanner and Booking.com API credentials in n8n.
2. Gmail Setup: Configure OAuth2 authentication.
3. Customization: Copy webhook URL, adjust validation rules, modify AI prompts and HTML template.
## Prerequisites
- Skyscanner API key
- Booking.com API credentials
- Gmail with OAuth2
- n8n instance
## Use Cases
- Personal vacation planning
- Business travel arrangements
## Customization
- Add APIs (Kiwi, Expedia)
- Filter by budget, Modify email design
## Benefits
- Saves 2-3 hours per trip
- Real-time pricing comparison

workflow.name: Smart Travel Package Finder - Search Flights & Hotels with Skyscanner-Booking.com

parameters.jsCode:
// HTML Email Generator for Travel Itineraries const data = $input.first().json; const { searchParams, itineraries, totalCombinations, flightsFound, hotelsFound } = data; // Format currency function formatCurrency(amount) { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD' }).format(amount); } // Format date function formatDate(dateString) { const date = new Date(dateString); return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'short', year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric' }); } // Format time function formatTime(dateString) { const date = new Date(dateString); return date.toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour: '2-digit', minute: '2-digit' }); } // Generate itinerary cards HTML function generateItineraryCards() { return itineraries.map((itinerary, index) => { const ranking = index + 1; const badge = ranking === 1 ? 'üèÜ BEST VALUE' : ''; return `

Option ${ranking}${badge}

${formatCurrency(itinerary.totalPrice)}
${itinerary.savings > 0 ? `
Save ${formatCurrency(itinerary.savings)}
` : ''}
‚úàÔ∏è

Flight Details

Airline
${itinerary.flight.airline}
Duration
${itinerary.flight.duration}
${itinerary.flight.origin}
${formatDate(itinerary.flight.departure)}
${formatTime(itinerary.flight.departure)}
‚Üí
${itinerary.flight.destination}
${formatDate(itinerary.flight.arrival)}
${formatTime(itinerary.flight.arrival)}
${itinerary.flight.priceFormatted}
Book Flight
üè®

Hotel Details

${itinerary.hotel.name}
${itinerary.hotel.address}
‚≠ê ${itinerary.hotel.rating.toFixed(1)} / 10
Nightly Rate
${formatCurrency(itinerary.hotel.pricePerNight)}
Total (${itinerary.hotel.nights} nights)
${formatCurrency(itinerary.hotel.totalPrice)}
${formatDate(searchParams.checkInDate)} - ${formatDate(searchParams.checkOutDate)}
Book Hotel
`; }).join(''); } // Generate comparison table function generateComparisonTable() { const rows = itineraries.map((itinerary, index) => ` ${index + 1} ${itinerary.flight.airline} ${itinerary.hotel.name} ${itinerary.flight.priceFormatted} ${formatCurrency(itinerary.hotel.totalPrice)} ${formatCurrency(itinerary.totalPrice)} `).join(''); return ` ${rows}
# Flight Hotel Flight Price Hotel Price Total
`; } // Generate complete HTML email const htmlEmail = ` Your Travel Itinerary Options

‚úàÔ∏è Your Travel Options

${searchParams.departure} ‚Üí ${searchParams.destination}

${formatDate(searchParams.checkInDate)} - ${formatDate(searchParams.checkOutDate)}

OPTIONS FOUND
${itineraries.length}
BEST PRICE
${formatCurrency(itineraries[0].totalPrice)}
MAX SAVINGS
${formatCurrency(itineraries[0].savings)}

üìã Recommended Packages

${generateItineraryCards()}

üìä Quick Comparison

${generateComparisonTable()}

‚ú® Generated by Smart Travel Itinerary System

Analyzed ${totalCombinations} combinations from ${flightsFound} flights and ${hotelsFound} hotels

Prices are subject to availability and may change

`; return [{ json: { subject: `üéâ ${itineraries.length} Travel Options: ${searchParams.departure} ‚Üí ${searchParams.destination}`, htmlBody: htmlEmail, recipient: searchParams.notificationEmail, itinerariesCount: itineraries.length, bestPrice: formatCurrency(itineraries[0].totalPrice), searchParams: searchParams } }];

user.name: Cheng Siong Chin
user.bio: Dr. Cheng Siong CHIN is an n8n workflow creator specializing in AI-powered automation, agent orchestration, and intelligent system integrations. He designs and builds end-to-end workflows that combine LLMs, APIs, and data pipelines to streamline complex processes and deliver production-ready automation solutions. Contact me to discuss custom AI workflows and agent architectures.
